definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks

sentences.english: Templates and foundation bolting shall be shipped separately from the vessels according to Purchaser's instruction.
sentences.chinese: 样板及地脚螺栓应根据买方指导同容器分开运输。

sentences.english: The default page footer for new documents that can be modified using the page setup dialog.
sentences.chinese: 新默认页面的地脚可以用页面设置对话框更改。

sentences.english: It also introduces the mortar pouring method for mounting foundation bolts.
sentences.chinese: 还介绍了浇装地脚螺栓时的压浆法等。

sentences.english: Fix the connection plate of foundation bolt with nut.
sentences.chinese: 将地脚螺栓连接板用螺母紧固。

sentences.english: The price is too high, and moreover, the house isn't in a suitable position.
sentences.chinese: 这幢房子价钱太贵，再者地脚也不好。

sentences.english: Fill the dried river fine sand into the foundation screw mounting holes of the diesel engine.
sentences.chinese: 柴油机地脚螺丝安装孔灌上干河沙。

definition: to step on/to tread on/to wear (shoes)/(slang) to dump (sb)/Taiwan pr. [deng4]
to land/to touch the ground/also pr. [zhuo2 di4]
stride/to step (on the spot)/to mark time/at a standstill
to tread/to stamp/to step on/to press a pedal/to investigate on the spot
foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks
Dongdong, cheerleading mascot of 2008 Beijing Olympics
